categories: Category:Enlisted stormtroopers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Leeno was a Human male stormtrooper who was assigned to join Jerec's fleet during the Galactic Civil War.

In 5 ABY, Leeno was a member of Patrol 341, led by Lieutenant Aagon and Sergeant Forley. The patrol was destroyed on Ruusan by a collection of settlers led by Kyle Katarn, Jan Ors, and Grif Grawley. Leeno was killed during the battle by an indigenous Bouncer.
